name: Memoriae
description:
A person is defined by their experiences. Rebuild memories and discover a life lived well in Memoriae.

A zen-like, puzzler about discovering the memories which form your identity, Memoriae was developed for the 2016 Rainbow Game Jam.

How to play:

Navigate the world used the W,A,S,D keys and press spacebar to interact with the environment.

Find each missing piece and put it back where it belongs to complete your past.

Developers:

Callum Fowlie Art

Louise Jackson Design

Gerda Gutmane Design

Brian Beacom Code
